law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 256, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1984; amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 414, sec. 30. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(2). -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 143, sec. 5. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 107, sec. 14.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Application for certificate -- What must contain -- Evidence of age -- Physical examination -- School record.
metadata.lrc-note: . This section was amended by 1984 Acts Ch. 414, Â§ 30 and repealed by 1984 Acts Ch. 256, Â§ 8. Pursuant to KRS 446.260, the repeal prevails.
